name: PrizmIO
body:
Installation ------------ Compiles with the latest libfxcg, available on https://github.com/Jonimoose/libfxcg.
To install it, just specify the FXCGSDK environment variable then run "make". If not specified, the installation directory will be "../../". Usage ----- Add "-lprizmio" to LDFLAGS in your Makefile and include "prizmio.h" in your code. Prizm I/O 0.1 is compatible with Nspire I/O 2.0 so you can make programs that works on both the Nspire and the Prizm (with some #ifdef abuse). Documentation ------------- An auto-generated documentation can be found in the "doc/html" directory, just open "index.html" (if something is unclear, please contact me and I will try to help you ;) The code of the demo application can be found in "src/demo". Contact ------- Julien "Juju" Savard
E-Mail: juju2143@gmail.com
Discussion topic: http://www.omnimaga.org/index.php?topic=14001.0
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: I/O library for the Casio Prizm
